name: raycast-emulator-list
title: Emulator List
description: List available Android emulators and iOS simulators.

commands.name: list-emulators
commands.title: List Emulators
commands.subtitle: Android & iOS
commands.description: List available Android emulators and iOS simulators.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1

author: danila_tsvetkov

preferences.name: androidEmulatorPathWindows
preferences.title: Android Emulator Path (Windows)
preferences.description: Path to the Android emulator executable on Windows. Leave empty to use 'emulator' from PATH.

preferences.name: androidEmulatorPathMacOS
preferences.title: Android Emulator Path (macOS)
preferences.description: Path to the Android emulator executable on macOS.
